post.description: Index a new document in the vector database.
Index a list of documents in the vector database.

get.description:
Searches for similar documents using semantic vector search.
Scholarly documents are indexed with metadata and embeddings, allowing for efficient retrieval.

parameters.name: query

schema.description: The text to search for
schema.title: Query

parameters.description: The text to search for

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: The maximum number of documents to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: The maximum number of documents to return

parameters.name: offset

schema.description: The offset to start fetching documents from
schema.title: Offset

parameters.description: The offset to start fetching documents from

parameters.name: filter

schema.description: The criteria to filter the search results
schema.title: Filter

parameters.description: The criteria to filter the search results

year equal to.summary: year equal to a specific value
year equal to.description: The `year` field equal to a specific value here `2023`

year greater than.summary: year greater than a specific value
year greater than.description: The `year` field greater than a specific value here `2013`

citations in range.description: The `citations` field in a specific range here `10` to `100`

title like.description:
The `title` field like a specific value here `machine learning`.
         This will use full text search index to find the documents.

language in list.description: The `language` field in a specific list here `en` or `fr`

complex filter.description:
A complex filter with multiple fields.
         You can use `AND`, `OR` and `NOT` operators to combine the filters.
          Here `year` not equal to `2013` and `issbn` not in a specific list and `title` like a specific value
complex filter.value: (year != 2013 OR issbn NOT IN ["1231313", "1231355444"]) AND title LIKE "machine learning"

parameters.name: focus

schema.description: The sources to search from
schema.title: Focus

parameters.description: The sources to search from

parameters.name: fields

schema.description: Which fields to return in the response, comma-separated. null for all fields
schema.title: Fields

parameters.description: Which fields to return in the response, comma-separated. null for all fields

parameters.name: fields

schema.description: Which fields to return in the response, comma-separated. null for all fields
schema.title: Fields

get.description:

The `title` field like a specific value here `machine learning`.
         This will use full text search index to find the documents.

A complex filter with multiple fields.
         You can use `AND`, `OR` and `NOT` operators to combine the filters.
          Here `year` not equal to `2013` and `issbn` not in a specific list and `title` like a specific value
complex filter.value: (year != 2013 OR issbn NOT IN ["1231313", "1231355444"]) AND title LIKE "machine learning"
